description: A React functional component named DocumentUpload that provides a form for uploading document metadata such as document type, number, and issuing country. It manages form state with React hooks, handles form submission by calling an external API service (kycService), and displays success or error messages based on the upload result.

methods.name: DocumentUpload({ caseId, onUploaded })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a document upload form with state management and submission handling.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the component's state when input fields change, synchronizing form inputs with component state.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls external service to upload metadata, manages loading state, and handles success/error feedback.
